document_data.name: Extradimensional Detection
document_data.mainbody: '''''Extradimensional detection''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[divination]] [[spell]] from the [[Numbers sphere|numbers]] and [[divination sphere]]s that detected the presence of any extradimensional pockets.
document_data.Effects: This spell revealed extradimensional pockets within an area measuring {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} wide by {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} long. The caster could turn and scan new areas as well. ''Extradimensional detection'' could be blocked by solid stone, metal, or wood depending on the thickness.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: The ''[[Scepter of Mystra]]'', a relic of the [[Mystra]]n faith, could cast the ''extradimensional detection'' spell.{{cite book/Prayers from the Faithful|77-80}}
